About 10 Dana St Unit 7

Beautiful 1st floor apartment close to Harvard Square located in historic building, the Castle. Light-filled, overlooking courtyard. Walking distance to Harvard Square, Central Square and the red line. Beautiful hardwood floors and fireplace. Private deeded storage on-site, storage unit #7, bike storage, and laundry facilities on site. Professionally managed building. Current tenant pays $2200 per month, lease expires end of May 2024.
